name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】秘密結社holoX3周年 3DLIVE【#SSholoX3周年】 [ztW56LCevmI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Secret Society holoX performing their 3rd anniversary song 'Gyoko Chronicle'.
Kazama Iroha giving a heartfelt speech thanking the fans at a podium.

subtitles.original:
暁光クロニクル
作詞・作曲・編曲：Luna
subtitles.english:
Gyoko Chronicle
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Luna

subtitles.original: 右も左も まだ僕ら分からずに
subtitles.english: We didn't know left from right yet...

subtitles.original: じゃあゴールだけ 決めてしまえって
subtitles.english: So we just decided to set a goal.

subtitles.original: 姿形も色も違うけど
subtitles.english: Though our shapes and colors are different...

subtitles.original: 同じ歩幅で 隣を歩ける
subtitles.english: We can walk side-by-side with the same stride.

subtitles.original: 今日はどう過ごそうメンバー
subtitles.english: How shall we spend today, members?

subtitles.original: 妄想でさえ 語り合おうよ 明日も
subtitles.english: Let's talk about even our wildest dreams tomorrow too.

subtitles.original: 天気予報で気分が変わっても
subtitles.english: Even if our moods change with the weather forecast...

subtitles.original: 雨のち晴れなら 一休みしてから
subtitles.english: If it clears up after the rain, we'll take a short break...

subtitles.original: 扉を開けよう
subtitles.english: And then open the door!

subtitles.original: ねえ僕らどうしたって同じ 場所できっと出会う
subtitles.english: Hey, no matter what, we'll surely meet in the same place.

subtitles.original: 上手く行かない日々も 愛しく思えたんだ
subtitles.english: I've come to love even the days when things don't go well.

subtitles.original: どんな下らない作戦だって 顔を合わせながら
subtitles.english: No matter how silly the strategy, while looking at each other's faces...

subtitles.original: 真剣に向き合ってさ
subtitles.english: We face it seriously.

subtitles.original: 誰よりも信じてた 必死に生きてきたんだ
subtitles.english: We believed more than anyone, we've lived life to the fullest!

subtitles.original: いつだって笑えるように
subtitles.english: So we can always smile.

subtitles.original: 前も後ろも まだ僕ら分からずに
subtitles.english: We didn't know front from back yet...

subtitles.original: ただゴールだけ 目印にして
subtitles.english: So we just used the goal as a landmark...

subtitles.original: 旗を掲げた
subtitles.english: And raised our flag.

subtitles.original: 今日はどう過ごそうメンバー
subtitles.english: How shall we spend today, members?

subtitles.original: 煩悩でさえ 預け合おうよ この先に
subtitles.english: Let's share even our worldly desires in the future.

subtitles.original: 何が待ってたとしても変わらない
subtitles.english: No matter what's waiting for us, nothing will change.

subtitles.original: 一つずつ積み上げた この欠片を
subtitles.english: Each of these pieces we've stacked up...

subtitles.original: 後悔しないだろう
subtitles.english: We won't regret them.

subtitles.original: ねえ僕らどうしたって同じ 想いをきっと描く
subtitles.english: Hey, no matter what, we'll surely paint the same feelings.

subtitles.original: どこか足りないピースも それで良かったんだ
subtitles.english: Even missing pieces were okay.

subtitles.original: どんな下らない作戦だって 顔を合わせながら
subtitles.english: No matter how silly the strategy, while looking at each other's faces...

subtitles.original: 真剣に向き合ってさ
subtitles.english: We face it seriously.

subtitles.original: 誰よりも願っていた
subtitles.english: We wished for it more than anyone.

subtitles.original: 日が暮れては帰ろうねと
subtitles.english: “Let's go home when the sun sets,” we said.

subtitles.original: 当たり前のこんな日々が
subtitles.english: Days like these, which we take for granted...

subtitles.original: どんな輝く宝石よりも
subtitles.english: Are more than any sparkling jewel.

subtitles.original: 大事だった
subtitles.english: They were important.

subtitles.original: 互いにふざけ合った日だって 抱き締め合った日だって
subtitles.english: Days we fooled around, days we hugged each other...

subtitles.original: 傷つけ合った日さえも 全部全部が
subtitles.english: Even the days we hurt each other, every single thing...

subtitles.original: 鮮やかに浮かんでいくよ いつかの遠い
subtitles.english: Will surface vividly, from some distant...

subtitles.original: 遠い空へと
subtitles.english: Distant sky.

subtitles.original: ねえ僕らどうしたって同じ場所できっと出会う
subtitles.english: Hey, no matter what, we'll surely meet in the same place.

subtitles.original: どうしたってここが 居場所だって分かる
subtitles.english: No matter what, I know this is where I belong.

subtitles.original: 混ざり合った声も 心地良かったんだ
subtitles.english: Even the mingling voices felt comfortable.

subtitles.original: どんな下らない作戦だって 顔を合わせながら
subtitles.english: No matter how silly the strategy, while looking at each other's faces...

subtitles.original: 真剣に向き合ってさ
subtitles.english: We face it seriously.

subtitles.original: 誰よりも信じてた 必死に生きてきたんだ
subtitles.english: We believed more than anyone, we've lived life to the fullest!

subtitles.original: いつだって笑えるように
subtitles.english: So we can always smile.

subtitles.original: 明日も笑えるように
subtitles.english: So we can smile tomorrow too.

subtitles.original: ホロックスの皆殿へ、いつもホロックスを...
subtitles.english: To all the holoX fans, for always...

subtitles.original: 応援していただき、本当にありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: supporting holoX, thank you so much.

subtitles.original: よく３年前、緊張していた我々を
subtitles.english: Three years ago, when you welcomed us warmly...

subtitles.original: あたたかく迎えていただいた時から今日まで
subtitles.english: even though we were so nervous, up until today...

subtitles.original: 皆殿からたくさんの勇気とエネルギーをいただいてきました。
subtitles.english: we've received so much courage and energy from all of you.
